In her latest Instagram post, Ciara captured a heart-melting moment with Amora in a selfie that reminded fans just how much the little one takes after her father.Russell Wilson may be suiting up for a new team, the New York Giants, but it‚Äôs clear that his offseason wasn‚Äôt just about transitioning from the Pittsburgh Steelers. In one recent update, Ciara wrote, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been a Whirl-Win ü´∂üèΩüå™Ô∏è‚Äù‚Äîa fitting caption for the flurry of love, life, and laughter that surrounds the family.As if balancing parenting duties and high-profile careers wasn‚Äôt enough, Ciara and Russell Wilson also celebrated a major personal milestone‚Äîtheir 9th wedding anniversary. The pair, who co-parent son Future alongside their own children‚ÄîSienna, Win, and Amora‚Äîhave long exemplified what modern family unity can look like.Though Russell Wilson‚Äôs now donning blue for the Giants, one can only imagine Amora in her game-day gear, cheering on Dad just like she did during his Pittsburgh stint. With Ciara sharing more glimpses of her growing daughter and Russell diving back into the grind, the Wilson family continues to strike a beautiful balance between fame, football, and family.The Grammy-winning singer and New York Giants quarterback started dating in 2015 and got married in July 2016.Ciara and Russell Wilson are parents to Future Zahir, Sienna Princess, Win Harrison and Amora Princess.Amora Princess is currently 1 year old and already showing a striking resemblance to her dad, Russell Wilson.Also Read: Donald Trump's hypocrisy? Article Title: WWE Hall of Famer Hulk Hogan passes away at 71
Article Text:
Professional wrestler Hulk Hogan poses for photographers on March 29, 2018, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File)

Hulk Hogan dies due to sudden cardiac arrest at the age of 71 in Florida

FULL MATCH: Hulk Hogan vs. Andre the Giant - WWE Title Match: WrestleMania III

Looking back at Hulk Hogan‚Äôs WWE journey

Also Read

In a shocking incident, WWE Hall of Famer Hulk Hogan passed away at the age of 71, leaving behind a great wrestling legacy. The veteran WWE star, known for his wrestling prowess and charisma, reportedly passed away on July 24, 2025, on Thursday, at his Clearwater, Florida, residence. Medics are currently suspecting that the reason for his death could have been due to sudden cardiac arrest.Reports suggest that multiple police units and EMTs were seen outside Hogan‚Äôs home on Thursday, and the WWE icon was carried out on a stretcher and rushed into an ambulance. However, the WWE icon succumbed to the cardiac arrest. This sudden and unfortunate demise of the wrestling star has left the fans and the WWE Universe mourning. WWE star Hulk Hogan has reportedly passed away due to a sudden cardiac arrest on July 24, 2025, in Florida. At the time of his death, the WWE Hall of Famer was 71. As per reports by TMZ, emergency responders were dispatched to his Clearwater residence early Thursday morning following a reported cardiac arrest. Despite immediate medical attention, Hogan could not be revived.As for his appearance, Hogan was last seen in WWE in one of the editions of RAW this year in 2025.Earlier, Hogan‚Äôs wife, Sky Daily, had publicly denied speculation that he was in a coma, assuring fans that his heart was "strong" and that he was steadily recovering from recent surgeries.However, in May, the WWE Hall of Famer had undergone a neck procedure, and rumors had swirled about his declining health, which were firmly denied at the time. Till the writing of this report, Hogan‚Äôs family has not issued a public statement yet.Hulk Hogan, born Terry Gene Bollea, is one of the most iconic figures in professional wrestling history. Known for his larger-than-life persona, charismatic presence, and legendary catchphrases, Hogan became a household name during the 1980s and 1990s in the wrestling community.Throughout his career, Hogan won multiple world championships, headlined numerous WrestleMania events, and later helped transform WCW. He was favourite among his fans due to his signature moves and red-and-yellow attire. For his huge contributions to WWE, Hogan was inducted as a WWE Hall of Famer in the year 2005, and inducted a second time in 2020 as a member of the nWo.Meanwhile, WWE has recently confirmed Hulk Hogan's demise and extended its condolences to the wrestler's family and friends.
Article Summary: Hulk hogan reportedly passed away on july 24, 2025, at his clearwater, florida, residence. Medics suspect that the reason for his death could have been due to sudden cardiac arrest. In may, the wwe hall of famer had undergone a neck procedure, and rumors had swirled about his declining health.

Article Title: ‚ÄúYour son is different‚Äù: Gisele B√ºndchen revealed son Benjamin faced bullying over being Tom Brady‚Äôs child
Article Text:
Gisele B√ºndchen revealed that her son Benjamin faced bullying in Boston due to the immense pressure of being Tom Brady's son (Getty Images)

The pressure of being the son of an NFL legend took a toll on young Benjamin

Gisele B√ºndchen's parenting approach: letting kids follow their own path

Tom Brady previously struggled to accept his son‚Äôs disinterest in sports

FAQs

1. Why was Tom Brady‚Äôs son Benjamin bullied?

2. What sports does Benjamin Brady enjoy?



3. How did Tom Brady react to Benjamin not liking football?

In a candid April 2023 Vanity Fair cover story, Gisele B√ºndchen opened up about the unique challenges of parenting in the shadow of fame‚Äîparticularly when your child is the son of a football icon. Her 13-year-old son Benjamin, whom she shares with NFL great Tom Brady, faced bullying in Boston simply for being Brady‚Äôs son, following a youth baseball game.The revelation offered a rare glimpse into the emotional cost of growing up with a last name that carries immense expectations, especially in a city like Boston where Tom Brady is practically royalty. Gisele B√ºndchen explained that Benjamin prefers ‚Äúnon-ball‚Äù sports like skiing and surfing‚Äîfar removed from the high-pressure world of gridirons and Super Bowl rings.The Brazilian supermodel, Gisele B√ºndchen reflected deeply on how she chooses extracurriculars for her children. ‚ÄúHow can I help them to have a person that has that level of integrity and can teach them values?‚Äù she said of finding the right mentors and activities. She also praised their shared interest in jiujitsu, proudly adding, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre all like senseis.‚ÄùThe Vanity Fair piece also explored how Brady and B√ºndchen have embraced co-parenting following their divorce, with Gisele maintaining a "great relationship" with Bridget Moynahan, Tom's ex and mother of his eldest son Jack, 15.Jack, unlike Benjamin, has reportedly shown interest in football and dreams of attending the University of Michigan, just like his dad.In a 2019 Men‚Äôs Health interview, Tom Brady admitted it was difficult to accept that Benjamin didn‚Äôt share his enthusiasm for competitive sports. ‚ÄúI was like, ‚ÄòWhat? No, do this!‚Äô‚Äù he recalled. But Gisele offered clarity, telling him: ‚ÄúWould you effing understand that your son is different?‚ÄùEventually, Brady found joy in meeting Benjamin where he was. ‚ÄúWhen we do that, we have the best time. He‚Äôs like, ‚ÄòOMG, Dad, you‚Äôre so funny.‚Äô‚Äù The story marked a rare but heartfelt look at how one of America‚Äôs most famous sports families navigates individuality‚Äîand the pressures that come with legacy.Also Read: Not pretty enough: Tom Brady's ex-wife Gisele B√ºndchen exposes fashion industry‚Äôs brutal bullying for being too ugly Benjamin faced bullying in Boston due to the pressure of being Tom Brady‚Äôs son and not sharing his father‚Äôs interest in traditional sports.Unlike his father Tom Brady, Benjamin prefers ‚Äúnon-ball‚Äù sports like surfing, skiing, and jiujitsu.Tom Brady admitted it was hard to accept at first, but eventually embraced his son‚Äôs different interests with support and humor.
Article Summary: Gisele b√ºndchen opened up about the unique challenges of parenting in the shadow of fame. Her 13-year-old son benjamin, whom she shares with nfl great tom brady, faced bullying in boston simply for being brady‚Äôs son. Gisele explained that benjamin prefers ‚Äúnon-ball‚Äù sports like skiing and surfing.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant finally breaks silence on wild pregnancy rumors with a wild response featuring a Rihanna meme
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant. Image via: Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic, Getty Images

Vanessa Bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild Instagram story



Vanessa Bryant's instagram response. Image via: vanessabryant/ Instagram

Poll Do you think Vanessa Bryant handled the pregnancy rumors well? Yes, very cleverly No, she should have addressed them directly

Met Gala Surprise: Rihanna Stuns With Baby Bump Reveal, A$AP Rocky Confirms It‚Äôs Baby No 3

After days of unrelenting speculation, Vanessa Bryant took to Instagram Stories on Sunday, June 1, to put the rumors to rest. Her response wasn‚Äôt a press statement or a legal warning, it was a wild meme with a big middle finger to the internet trolls. The meme featured music icon Rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head, holding a drink, and flipping her middle finger.‚ÄúMe protecting my peace, not pregnant & having fun all summer,‚Äù Vanessa Bryant wrote in the caption on her response to the online trolls who spread her pregnancy rumors about five years after her husband, Kobe Bryant ‚Äôs, untimely and devastating demise.It was clear, clever, and vintage Vanessa who shut down noise without saying a word about the origin of the gossip. No press release needed when you‚Äôve got Rihanna energy with a direct middle finger gesture.The rumors had emerged out of nowhere, with some users pointing to photos allegedly showing a "baby bump," though no timestamps or context were attached to those images. Vanessa hasn't been publicly linked to anyone romantically, and there‚Äôs been zero confirmation from her side‚Äîuntil now.In another Instagram Story later that evening, Vanessa Bryant shared a motivational quote that hinted at how she views the entire situation and what matters to her personally.‚ÄúThe only way to impress me, is by being a good person,‚Äù the quote read. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt care what you have, what you wear, where you live, or what you drive. I just have deep respect for people with pure hearts and good intentions.‚ÄùAdding one final touch to her trilogy of clapbacks, she posted another Rihanna meme, this one stating, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not mean, I‚Äôm just not the one.‚ÄùWith the classic Rihanna memes, Vanessa showed that she is busy being a proud mom to her daughters while being the powerhouse of her business ventures. While she does not care about the rumor mill, her reaction explicitly showed that she is urging privacy.Vanessa Bryant, who shares four daughters with Kobe‚Äî Natalia, Bianka, Capri, and the late Gianna‚Äî has remained devoted to family and philanthropy. Most recently, she shared footage of a joyful family ski trip over the holidays, showing the tight-knit bond she maintains with her children.Natalia Bryant stepped into the fashion world just like her mother, officially joining IMG Models in 2021 at the age of 18. ‚ÄúEver since I can remember, I wanted to model,‚Äù she shared in a statement posted by IMG on Instagram. ‚ÄúThere is a lot to learn, but I feel this is a great opportunity for me to learn and express myself creatively.‚ÄùVanessa and Kobe Bryant tied the knot in April 2001. Tragically, in January 2020, Kobe and their 13-year-old daughter Gianna lost their lives in a helicopter crash that also killed seven others. They were headed to Kobe‚Äôs Mamba Sports Academy for a youth basketball game when the accident occurred. Kobe was 41 at the time. The loss shook the sports world and left a lasting impact on fans, friends, and loved ones across the globe. Kobe has left a huge legacy to his name as well, he is considered one the of the elite NBA superstars of all time with astounding stats, records and intense playmaking abilities. His demise created a huge void in the NBA world as fans are still mourning his untimely passing.Since their passing, she‚Äôs kept their memory alive through meaningful business ventures and charitable work. Kobe launched the Mamba Sports Foundation in 2016, aiming to support young athletes. After his death, Vanessa renamed it the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation in honor of both Kobe and Gianna. Today, the foundation helps underserved boys and girls in sports, pushing forward the mission they believed in. It's her way of carrying on their legacy with purpose and heart.Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs response was indeed witty and empowering as she hinted that she deserves privacy and reminded the world that while she may be a public figure, her peace and dignity aren‚Äôt up for debate, especially not over unfounded gossip. After the viral response via memes, Vanessa has seemingly closed the chapter as she did not extend the matter any further with any other comments about it afterwards.Days after shutting down the pregnancy rumor, Vanessa Bryant made a glowing courtside appearance with her daughters at the New York Liberty vs. Chicago Sky game. The WNBA shared a sweet clip showing Vanessa alongside Natalia, 22, Bianka, 8, and Capri, 5, all smiling and waving for the camera.Later, Vanessa uploaded an image of her in a restaurant, candidly posing as she waited for the food to be arrive. Considering the dress, it appears that the photograph was shot after her recent attendance in the game.Their family moment quickly caught fans‚Äô attention online, adding a warm highlight to the evening. It was a rare and heartwarming public outing for the Bryant family, showing their strong support for women‚Äôs basketball. It was Vanessa's first public outing since she debunked the horrendous pregnancy rumors.Recently, Vanessa honored her husband Kobe's memory with a heartfelt Instagram post on Instagram, sharing a throwback photograph of the family with the NBA legend, "Happy Fathers Day @kobebryant üíï You are so missed. We love you so much. #GirlDad üíïüíï"Also Read: Is Vanessa Bryant pregnant with her 5th child? The Internet speculates about her relationship with rumoured BF Earlier this July, Vanessa Bryant added another heartfelt moment to her social media with a birthday post for her sister, Sophie. The sweet throwback photo featured Vanessa, her late husband Kobe Bryant, and Sophie together, smiling during happier times. It comes after several touching family updates, including daughter Natalia‚Äôs recent USC graduation and emotional tribute to her dad.As for her fortune, Vanessa's net worth has seen major growth over the years. While Kobe Bryant‚Äôs NBA success helped build their fortune, Vanessa carved her own path too. She‚Äôs earned recognition as a model, businesswoman, and philanthropist, adding to her wealth through years of steady work.As of 2025, her estimated net worth is $600 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth. A large portion of that came from Kobe‚Äôs estate, after his tragic passing in 2020. At the time, Forbes valued the Lakers legend‚Äôs net worth at $600 million.
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant addressed her pregnancy rumors in a wild instagram story. The meme featured music icon rihanna floating in water with a snorkel mask on her head, holding a drink, and flipping her middle finger. Vanessa's response was witty and empowering as she hinted that she deserves privacy.

Article Title: Is Brock Lesnar‚Äôs wrestling career over? TKO insiders give bombshell update on The Beast‚Äôs WWE future
Article Text:
Brock Lesnar. Image via: WWE

Daniel Cormier reveals that Brock Lesnar is banned from TKO



DANIEL CORMIER SOUNDS OFF on JON JONES, ASPINALL, MMA GURU?! | EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW

Will Brock Lesnar return to WWE?



FAQs

Is Brock Lesnar banned from WWE and professional wrestling?



Why was Brock Lesnar‚Äôs name linked to the Vince McMahon lawsuit?



When did Brock Lesnar last appear on WWE programming?



Brock Lesnar, once the most dominant force in both WWE and UFC, now finds himself in an unthinkable position. He has been sidelined, silent, and reportedly banned from professional wrestling altogether. As per reports, WWE is distancing itself from Lesnar. Additionally, insiders are dropping cryptic but serious comments, which have extended the speculation. Now the question remains, is this the end of The Beast Incarnate‚Äôs career?Daniel Cormier has recently shared up update on Brock Lesnar that put the wrestling world in a frenzy. On The MightyCast with Demetrious Johnson, the former UFC Heavyweight Champion revealed that Brock Lesnar is currently blacklisted from professional wrestling. Though Cormier declined to elaborate, his tone left little room for doubt.‚ÄúBrock is on the banned list right now,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúBrock got into so much trouble. You know what Brock did. I ain‚Äôt telling you on air what Brock did. Brock is in so much trouble.‚ÄùThe remarks come amid the fallout from the high-profile lawsuit filed by former WWE employee Janel Grant, who accused Vince McMahon and others of se*ual misconduct and trafficking.Though Lesnar‚Äôs name was initially listed in the documents and later removed, his association with the case has had lasting consequences.In fact, Lesnar hasn't appeared on WWE programming since his loss to Cody Rhodes at SummerSlam 2023. He has been scrubbed from WWE marketing material, future events, and even casual mention by the promotion itself. A source close to the company told multiple outlets that Lesnar is being treated as "radioactive" amid ongoing legal uncertainty.While Lesnar has avoided the spotlight, he was recently spotted in public, looking fitter than ever. Fans shared photos of the 46-year-old taking selfies outside a restaurant, his shredded physique sparking whispers of a potential comeback. When asked about returning to WWE, he reportedly offered a vague reply: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll see.‚ÄùStill, without a clear path forward and no statement from either WWE or TKO, Lesnar‚Äôs future remains up in the air. Though Cormier‚Äôs knowledge of WWE‚Äôs internal decisions can be debated, the weight of his comments can‚Äôt be dismissed lightly, especially when paired with the company‚Äôs decision to effectively erase Lesnar from its present and near-future plans.For now, Lesnar‚Äôs focus seems to be on family. While The Beast may be lying low, fans and critics alike are left wondering, has the final bell already tolled for Brock Lesnar? So far, it‚Äôs hard to tell. Still, many fans would want to see The Beast making his WWE return with a surprise, especially as a worthy opponent of John Cena in his retirement tour. But as for the current situation, at least, according to Cormier, it is far-fetched.Also Read: Roman Reigns Confronts Paul Heyman on Raw to Sow Seeds for a Huge Clash at SummerSlam According to Daniel Cormier, Lesnar is on the "banned list," though WWE hasn‚Äôt officially confirmed it.Lesnar was initially named in the lawsuit filed by Janel Grant, who alleged trafficking and misconduct, but his name was later removed.Lesnar hasn‚Äôt been seen on WWE TV since his match against Cody Rhodes at SummerSlam 2023.
Article Summary: Daniel cormier reveals that brock lesnar is banned from tko and professional wrestling. The remarks come amid the fallout from the high-profile lawsuit filed by former wwe employee janel grant, who accused vince mcmahon and others of se*ual misconduct and trafficking.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers Floated in Bold Five-Team Deal Landing $238 Million Utah Jazz Superstar; LeBron James and Austin Reaves Key Trade Assets?
Article Text:
Austin Reaves and LeBron James of the Los Angeles Lakers (Credits: AP Photo/Jessie Alcheh)

Los Angeles Lakers

LeBron James

The Proposed Trade: A Five-Team Shake-Up

Full Trade Breakdown

Team Receives Cleveland Cavaliers LeBron James, Austin Reaves, Walker Kessler, 2027 1st-round pick (lottery-protected via Miami), and $27.2 million in salary savings



Los Angeles Lakers Lauri Markkanen, De‚ÄôAndre Hunter, Max Strus



Utah Jazz Darius Garland, Maxi Kleber



Charlotte Hornets Jarrett Allen



Brooklyn Nets Grant Williams, Jarred Vanderbilt, 2027 1st-round pick (top-2 protected via Dallas)





What the Los Angeles Lakers Gain and Lose

Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James (23) shoots over Dallas Mavericks' Anthony Davis (3) as Max Christie, left, and Austin Reaves, right, look on in the second half of an NBA basketball game in Dallas, Wednesday, April 9, 2025. (Image via AP Photo/Julio Cortez)

Incoming Players:

The Cavs Reunite with Their King

The Reaves Factor Would Be A Costly Sacrifice

Is the Trade Feasible?

In a dramatic new trade proposal that‚Äôs making waves across the NBA world, theare predicted to part ways with franchise cornerstoneand rising star Austin Reaves in a blockbuster five-team deal. Originally floated by Bleacher Report‚Äôs Greg Swartz, the deal imagines LeBron James finishing his career where it began ‚Äî in Cleveland ‚Äî while the Lakers reshape their roster around younger, defensive-minded players.The hypothetical deal suggested by Swartz is part of his piece titled ‚Äú3 Trade Packages To Bring LeBron James Home to the Cleveland Cavaliers .‚Äù Of the three scenarios, this one stands out for its complexity and high-profile names.This proposed trade shakes up rosters across five teams and addresses different franchise needs‚Äîfrom Cleveland‚Äôs desire for a LeBron homecoming to Brooklyn‚Äôs aim for long-term picks and depth.If the Los Angeles Lakers were to greenlight this deal, they‚Äôd be giving up not just LeBron James, but also their breakout guard Austin Reaves‚Äîarguably the second and third-best players on the current roster. The return? One All-Star forward and two premium role players.- Lauri Markkanen: Former All-Star forward, averaged 18.2 points and 7.1 rebounds on 37% from three throughout his career.- De‚ÄôAndre Hunter: A two-way forward who was putting up nearly 20 points per game before his move to Cleveland.- Max Strus: Known for his three-and-D prowess, fits perfectly in a modern defensive lineup.‚ÄúLauri Markkanen is a one-time All-Star, has more potential to grow, and is more clearly on the same timeline as Luka Doncic,‚Äù wrote Swartz in his breakdown.While the deal strips the Los Angeles Lakers of LeBron‚Äôs leadership and Reaves‚Äô ascending talent, it compensates with youth, defense, and perimeter shooting‚Äîtraits that align with current trends in team-building.Bringing LeBron James back to Cleveland would be a full-circle moment in NBA history. After winning a title with the Cavaliers in 2016, a return for one last chapter would be an emotional high point for both the player and the franchise. With Austin Reaves and Walker Kessler added to the mix, the Cavs would deepen their rotation while LeBron provides veteran leadership and late-game poise.For Los Angeles Lakers fans, parting ways with Reaves might sting more than moving on from the aging LeBron. Reaves has grown into a reliable scoring option, averaging 20 points per game in just his fourth season. While he‚Äôs not the best defender, his offensive efficiency and steady development make him a key piece.Yet if the goal is to build a defensive-minded roster that can stretch the floor, this trade supports that vision‚Äîeven if it‚Äôs painful in the short term.While the proposed trade is loaded with logic and upside, the logistics of coordinating five teams remain a massive hurdle. Salary matching, team preferences, and player buy-in could complicate the framework. But for fans and analysts alike, it offers a fascinating glimpse at what a post-LeBron Lakers roster could look like.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Golden State Warriors Predicted to Target $2,800,834 Miami Heat Center As Logical Backup Plan if Horford Deal Falls Through If the Los Angeles Lakers are serious about pivoting away from the LeBron era and building a younger, more defensively versatile team, Swartz‚Äôs proposed mega-deal might just be worth considering.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are predicted to part ways with franchise cornerstoneand rising star austin reaves in a blockbuster five-team deal. Originally floated by bleacher report‚Äôs greg swartz, the deal imagines lebron james finishing his career where it began ‚Äî in cleveland.

Article Title: Anthony Richardson opens up on what crowd‚Äôs cheer meant during Colts practice after tough season
Article Text:
Anthony Richardson opens up on what crowd‚Äôs cheer meant during Colts practice after tough season (Image Via X)

What was Anthony Richardson‚Äôs response on the crowd‚Äôs cheer

Anthony Richardson and the bigger practice context

Also Read:

FAQs



1. What did Anthony Richardson say about the Colts fans cheering for him at training camp?

2. When and where did Anthony Richardson practice with the Colts and hear the crowd cheer?

3. Is Anthony Richardson competing with Daniel Jones for the Colts‚Äô starting quarterback spot?

The tale starts at Grand Park in Westfield, Indiana, on July 23, 2025. When something unexpected occurred, Indianapolis Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson was working with the team. The audience at the open training camp session yelled for him. This cheering came during a time when Anthony Richardson has struggled with accuracy and health. It built a bit of suspense, what did it mean for him, and what did he say next?Anthony Richardson spoke to reporters after the first training camp practice of the year, held on Wednesday, July 23 at Grand Park in Westfield, Indiana. He said the crowd‚Äôs reaction made him feel support from the city. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs exciting,‚Äù Anthony Richardson said. ‚ÄúBecause I know this city loves and supports me,‚Äù he added.He admitted that things have been difficult. He said, ‚ÄúI just gotta do my part‚Ä¶ I got a lot of work to do.‚Äù The fans‚Äô cheering came while he and Daniel Jones split time with the first‚Äëteam offense during practice.Anthony Richardson and Daniel Jones shared quarterback reps with the Indianapolis Colts‚Äô first team during the July 23 practice at Grand Park, as part of day one of the 2025 training camp.Head coach Shane Steichen said both had ‚Äúgood things‚Äù during the full‚Äëteam and seven‚Äëon‚Äëseven drills.The team plans to monitor Anthony Richardson‚Äôs throw volume carefully given his shoulder injury this offseason and his history of missed games. Other media reported that Anthony Richardson‚Äôs accuracy last season was low, only about 47.7% completion rate, the lowest among regular NFL starters.Anthony Richardson‚Äôs quote came at a time when uncertainty surrounds the starting quarterback position. General manager Chris Ballard said he expects a competition between Richardson and Daniel Jones.Anthony Richardson missed part of the offseason program with a shoulder issue but returned to practice for camp. He clearly felt uplifted by the fans, despite the struggle. He said the support made him want to work even harder to justify the faith Indy fans have shown.He said it was exciting and made him feel loved and supported by the city.It happened on July 23, 2025, during the Colts‚Äô training camp at Grand Park in Westfield, Indiana.Yes, both quarterbacks are sharing first-team reps as the Colts evaluate who will start.
Article Summary: Anthony richardson and daniel jones shared quarterback reps with the indianapolis colts‚Äô first team during the july 23 practice at grand park, as part of day one of the 2025 training camp. Richardson missed part of the offseason program with a shoulder issue but returned to practice for camp.

Article Title: Did DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey fight at Steelers training camp? Here‚Äôs the truth
Article Text:
DK Metcalf‚ÄìJalen Ramsey Fight Rumor Debunked

No, DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey did not fight at Steelers training camp



Their past rivalry made the hoax believable to NFL fans online



Social media turned the fake fight into a trending NFL story



NFL Twitter Made Up a Steelers Fight and Everyone Fell for It

Steelers camp updates show Metcalf and Ramsey are just competing, not clashing

FAQs:

What is the history between DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey?

Are DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey teammates now?

NFL Twitter really said ‚ÄúLet‚Äôs cause chaos today.‚Äù Within the first hour of Steelers training camp, a tweet went viral claiming DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey got into a full-blown altercation, like, had-to-be-separated levels of drama. Fans were eating it up. Except, it was all fake. No fists. No yelling. Not even a glare. Just another case of social media running wild with a believable but totally made-up story. Let‚Äôs break down how this fake fight exploded online and why it fooled so many fans.There was no altercation between DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey during Steelers training camp. Despite a viral tweet claiming the two stars had to be separated after the first 7-on-7 rep, no legitimate source reported anything even remotely close. There‚Äôs no video. No photos. No confirmation from beat writers, teammates, or staff.The tweet came from a parody account and was completely fabricated. But the idea caught fire on NFL Twitter because it sounded just real enough.Here‚Äôs why the internet bought the lie: DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey have a real history from their NFC West days, Seahawks vs. Rams showdowns were always intense. Their one-on-one battles were legendary, with plenty of jawing and physicality.So when you hear they‚Äôre now teammates on the Steelers? Of course people expect sparks.That old rivalry gave the fake story instant credibility. And because training camp was just starting, it felt like exactly the kind of drama we‚Äôd see on Day 1.The post didn‚Äôt include any proof, but it didn‚Äôt matter. Fans started quote-posting, adding commentary, debating who would win, and even tagging Mike Tomlin like he needed to break it up himself.By the time fans realized it was a prank, it had already racked up thousands of likes and reposts. Even some sports blogs got caught up before doing a quick fact-check and realizing they‚Äôd been duped.According to real reporters at Steelers training camp, both DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey are standing out not for fighting, but for their elite level of competition. Analysts described their practice battles as ‚Äútwo sharks circling,‚Äù pushing each other in coverage and routes.This whole Metcalf‚ÄìRamsey rumor proves how fast fake NFL news spreads in the offseason. The altercation never happened, but it still gave fans something to talk about.So next time you see a wild tweet from training camp with no video, no quotes, and no receipts maybe pause before hitting retweet. The Steelers might have drama someday, but today isn‚Äôt that day.DK Metcalf and Jalen Ramsey have a long-standing rivalry from their days in the NFC West. Metcalf played for the Seattle Seahawks, while Ramsey was a shutdown corner for the Los Angeles Rams. Their matchups were intense, physical, and highly competitive, with frequent trash talk on and off the field.Yes, both players are now on the Pittsburgh Steelers roster. The Steelers made aggressive moves in the offseason, acquiring Ramsey and later bringing in Metcalf, aiming to strengthen both sides of the ball.Also read - Travis Hunter‚Äôs father arrested again just months after NFL Draft moment with son ‚Äî here‚Äôs what happened
Article Summary: Dk metcalf and jalen ramsey did not fight at steelers training camp. There was no video, photos, or confirmation from beat writers, teammates, or staff. The tweet came from a parody account and was completely fabricated. The idea caught fire on nfl twitter because it sounded just real enough.

Article Title: Warriors Superstar Stephen Curry Opens Up on Retirement, Emphasizes Love for the Game and Future Plans
Article Text:
Jakob Poeltl and Stephen Curry (Image via Canadian Press)

Golden State Warriors

Stephen Curry

Stephen Curry‚Äôs Realistic Yet Optimistic Outlook

How Stephen Curry is Still Elite at 37

Preparing for Life After Basketball

Stephen Curry is Not Done Yet

superstarhas offered fans a clearer picture of his future in the NBA, easing concerns about an imminent retirement. At 37 years old and with two seasons left on his current deal through 2026-27, Curry is approaching the twilight of his career with perspective and balance‚Äîpreferring to take things ‚Äútwo years at a time‚Äù rather than commit to a fixed retirement date. Stephen Curry‚Äôs comments reflect a mature understanding of the toll the game takes, especially during the offseason. He pointed out that preparing for the season‚Äîrepetitive conditioning, strength training, and daily grind‚Äîhas become more challenging than the 82-game season itself. Yet, he still finds joy in playing. ‚ÄúThe games are the easy part,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs the fun part.‚ÄùWhen it comes to retirement, Curry spoke candidly. He noted that some players are ‚Äúforced out,‚Äù while others walk away on their own terms. His hope is to be in the latter group, choosing to leave when his body tells him it‚Äôs time‚Äînot because he can no longer keep up. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want to be the one that‚Äôs limping up and down the court trying to keep up with the young bucks,‚Äù Curry added.Despite being one of the NBA‚Äôs oldest active stars, Stephen Curry remains one of its most effective. He averaged 24.5 points, six assists, and 4.4 three-pointers per game last season, earning All-NBA Second Team honors. His production hasn‚Äôt slowed, and the Golden State Warriors are making roster decisions with Curry‚Äôs competitive window in mind, hoping to capitalize on their championship potential while he‚Äôs still playing at a high level.Curry isn‚Äôt just thinking about basketball. Off the court, he‚Äôs laying the groundwork for his next chapter. He serves as CEO of Thirty Ink, a business umbrella that includes Unanimous Media, Gentleman‚Äôs Cut bourbon, and 7k, a marketing consultancy. He‚Äôs also expressed interest in sports broadcasting and NBA ownership, following the footsteps of former players like Michael Jordan and Carmelo Anthony.Whether he ends up in a broadcast booth or part of a front office, Curry seems intent on remaining a prominent figure in basketball long after his final game.For now, Warriors fans can rest easy: Curry isn‚Äôt planning to retire anytime soon. His focus is on staying healthy, having fun, and chasing more titles. His transparency about the aging process, the demands of the game, and the realities of legacy offer a refreshing, human look at one of the NBA‚Äôs greatest players.Also read: NBA Free Agency Rumors: New York Knicks predicted to land $50 million Orlando Magic star to boost bench depth and improve title odds Stephen Curry‚Äôs measured and thoughtful approach makes it clear‚Äîhe‚Äôs not just preparing for retirement; he‚Äôs preparing to make an impact long after his playing days are over.
Article Summary: Stephen curry has two seasons left on his current deal with the golden state warriors. At 37 years old, curry is one of the nba‚Äôs oldest active stars. He averaged 24.5 points, six assists, and 4.4 three-pointers per game last season. Curry also serves as ceo of thirty ink, a business umbrella that includes gentleman's cut bourbon, and 7k, a marketing consultancy.

Article Title: NBA Free Agency Rumors: New York Knicks predicted to land $50 million Orlando Magic star to boost bench depth and improve title odds
Article Text:
Knicks vs Pacers (Image via Getty)

New York Knicks

New York Knicks Struggled with Bench Output in 2024-25

Markelle Fultz: A Potential Buy-Low Target

Career Highlight Season (2022‚Äì23)

Markelle Fultz (Image via NBA)

Category Stat Points per Game



14.0



Assists per Game



5.7



Rebounds per Game



3.9



Steals per Game



1.5



Field Goal %



51.4%



Games Played



60





Low-Cost, High-Upside Fit for a New Knicks Identity

Theare in the midst of retooling their roster to build a more effective bench unit, and one NBA analyst believes signing former Magic Star, Markelle Fultz, could be a low-risk, high-reward move. With a new era beginning under head coach Mike Brown, the Knicks are aiming to address one of their most glaring weaknesses from last season ‚Äî second-unit production.Despite making the playoffs, the New York Knicks ‚Äô bench unit was statistically one of the worst in the league during the 2024-25 season. They ranked at the bottom in both bench points (21.7 per game) and bench minutes (12.7 per game) ‚Äî far below league averages. With a revamped coaching staff and strategic acquisitions like Jordan Clarkson and Guerschon Yabusele, the franchise is looking for one more piece to solidify its reserve rotation.Former 76ers guard Markelle Fultz, the No. 1 pick in the 2017 NBA Draft, has had a tumultuous career marked by injuries and inconsistent opportunities. Still just 27, Fultz played 21 games for the Sacramento Kings last season, averaging 2.9 points and 1.3 assists in limited action (8.8 minutes per game).While those numbers may seem underwhelming, his more extended stint with the Orlando Magic (2019‚Äì2024) tells a different story.When healthy, Fultz proved he could be a productive contributor off the bench or even in spot starts.His efforts on defense were also quietly impactful. According to The Sporting News, Markelle Fultz posted a 0.7 defensive box plus-minus that year, signaling his value as a two-way presence ‚Äî an area where the New York Knicks desperately need depth, especially behind starting guards like Jalen Brunson Bringing in Markelle Fultz wouldn‚Äôt require a large financial commitment, making the move a classic low-risk, high-reward gamble. He‚Äôs versatile, can play on or off the ball, and has experience bouncing back from adversity ‚Äî qualities that could thrive under Mike Brown‚Äôs system.If healthy, Fultz could provide:- Secondary ball-handling and playmaking- Defensive stability in short spurts- Veteran poise at just 27 years old- Insurance in case of injuries to the starting backcourtDean Simon of The Sporting News writes, ‚ÄúIf the New York Knicks are willing to give the two-way guard a shot at contributing to a team with championship aspirations in spot minutes, a healthy campaign for Markelle Fultz could result in the team completing one of the more underrated signings of the 2025 offseason.‚ÄùAlso read: NBA Analyst's Blockbuster Proposal Lands Warriors $82 Million Former Cavaliers Champion as Kevon Looney‚Äôs Replacement As the New York Knicks aim to build a title-contending squad, adding Markelle Fultz as a depth piece could be a smart bet. Given his pedigree, recent flashes, and age, the former top pick offers just enough upside to justify a roster spot. For a team that ranked among the worst in bench production last year, such a move might be exactly what they need to turn the corner.
Article Summary: The new york knicks are in the midst of retooling their roster to build a more effective bench unit. Nba analyst believes signing former magic star markelle fultz could be a low-risk, high-reward move. Fultz played 21 games for the sacramento kings last season, averaging 2.9 points and 1.3 assists in limited action (8.8 minutes per game)

Article Title: Controversy brews as Panthers consider benching $9.5M star Matthew Tkachuk to fix salary cap woes
Article Text:
Florida Panthers, fresh off their Stanley Cup win, are facing salary cap challenges and Matthew Tkachuk's injury might offer a solution. (Getty Images)

Matthew Tkachuk injury opens door for Panthers‚Äô salary cap workaround

Matthew Tkachuk‚Äôs groin injury could become Panthers‚Äô financial lifeline

FAQs

1. Why are the Panthers considering placing Matthew Tkachuk on LTIR?

2. Is Matthew Tkachuk seriously injured?

3. Could this move be seen as salary cap manipulation?

The Florida Panthers, stepped off another Stanley Cup win, face salary cap challenges. Star forward Matthew Tkachuk's injury could offer a solution. Placing him on long-term injured reserve would create cap relief, though he battled injuries across last season's championship run.Even as the champagne corks settle from their consecutive Stanley Cup triumph, the Florida Panthers' management faces pressing financial decisions. It's the hockey offseason, but for the front office, the work is far from over.A consequential hurdle looms: the team's current payroll surpasses the salary cap by a notable $3.75 million, a figure confirmed by Puck Pedia. This means the Panthers must strategically reduce their financial commitments to align with league regulations.One particularly impactful avenue for achieving cap consent revolves around key forward Matthew Tkachuk, whose contract carries a hefty $9.5 million impact on the team's salary structure. The possibility of his injury playing a role in this decision has been raised.Sportsnet's Nick Kypreos, in his assessment of Florida‚Äôs cap situation, put forth a compelling idea: ‚ÄúIf Tkachuk were to miss the beginning of the season and be out for a while, the Panthers would be able to get under the cap by putting his contract on LTIR.‚ÄùThis maneuver, placing a player on the long-term injured reserve, offers the distinct advantage of allowing a team to briefly exceed the salary cap.Matthew Tkachuk, a true competitor, played through significant injuries during the 2024-25 season, including a torn adductor and hernia sustained at the 4 Nations Face-Off. His dedication was vital to the Panthers' second consecutive Stanley Cup.In the 2025 Final, he bestowed three goals and seven assists. Tkachuk's substantial $9.5 million cap hit is a key factor, with Aleksander Barkov ($10 million), Sam Reinhart ($8.625 million), and Sam Bennett ($8 million, recently signed extension) also having large contracts.The Panthers face a tough offseason dilemma: balancing their championship roster with salary cap constraints, potentially relying on Matthew Tkachuk's injury status to navigate their financial tightrope.Also Read: Brad Marchand‚Äôs disrespectful celebration resurfaces as Panthers clinch Cup ‚Äî Canucks fans furious To create cap relief, as his $9.5M salary could help offset their $3.75M cap overage.Tkachuk has been dealing with lingering groin issues since the 4 Nations Face-Off and the playoffs.Some critics believe using LTIR for Tkachuk‚Äôs injury might be a strategic loophole rather than necessity.
Article Summary: Florida panthers, fresh off their stanley cup win, are facing salary cap challenges and matthew tkachuk's injury might offer a solution. Placing him on long-term injured reserve would create cap relief, though he battled injuries across last season's championship run.

Article Title: Taylor Swift allegedly cuts Blake Lively from Selena Gomez‚Äôs birthday bash as Travis Kelce quietly backs her inner circle shake-up
Article Text:
Taylor Swift reportedly orchestrated Blake Lively's exclusion from Selena Gomez's birthday celebration (Getty Images)



Taylor Swift reportedly ‚Äúcut‚Äù Blake Lively from Selena Gomez‚Äôs birthday guest list

Travis Kelce stands by Taylor Swift as her inner circle gets smaller ‚Äî and more curated

FAQs

1. Why was Blake Lively absent from Selena Gomez‚Äôs birthday party?

2. What caused the tension between Taylor Swift and Blake Lively?

3. Was Travis Kelce involved in the situation?

In the ever-evolving web of celebrity friendships, Taylor Swift appears to be making bold choices about who gets to stay in her close circle ‚Äî and who doesn‚Äôt. The latest drama? According to a report from #ShuterScoop, Swift may have been behind Blake Lively‚Äôs noticeable absence from Selena Gomez‚Äôs glitter-filled birthday party. And while the alleged fallout continues to spark headlines, Swift‚Äôs boyfriend, Travis Kelce, reportedly stood by her side during the festivities.A source told #ShuterScoop that Blake Lively was ‚Äúdeliberately cut from the guest list‚Äù for Gomez‚Äôs 33rd birthday bash ‚Äî and the reason points directly to Taylor Swift. The insider added that Lively‚Äôs ongoing legal drama with her It Ends With Us co-star Justin Baldoni may have become too toxic for Swift to tolerate. The source claimed Gomez simply wanted ‚Äúlove, light, and platform boots‚Äù ‚Äî not ‚Äúsubpoenas and side-eyes‚Äù ‚Äî at her party.That legal entanglement seems to have chilled what was once a beloved Hollywood friendship. While Swift and Lively were often seen together in past years ‚Äî including red carpets, Met Galas, and girls' nights out ‚Äî they haven‚Äôt been publicly photographed together in months. Lively‚Äôs notable absence from the party, and now from Swift‚Äôs inner circle, only adds fuel to the speculation.Amid all the noise, Travis Kelce was reportedly enjoying the celebration alongside Swift. While not confirmed by photos, insiders claim the NFL star is very much in the singer‚Äôs corner as she redefines her inner circle. Kelce has remained largely silent on Swift‚Äôs public feuds, but those close to him say he‚Äôs ‚Äúfully supportive‚Äù of her choices ‚Äî including who she decides to keep close.As Selena Gomez shared joyful, disco-themed photos with Swift and others from the bash, one face was clearly missing: Blake Lively‚Äôs. And if sources are to be believed, it wasn‚Äôt by accident.Also Read: Taylor Swift cuts off Blake Lively amid explosive lawsuit drama‚Äî and engagement rumors with Travis Kelce heat up Sources claim Taylor Swift had her deliberately removed from the guest list due to their ongoing feud.Reports suggest their friendship soured after Lively dragged Swift into her legal battle with Justin Baldoni.While not directly involved, sources say Kelce supported Swift‚Äôs decision and was present at the party.
Article Summary: Taylor swift reportedly orchestrated blake lively's exclusion from selena gomez's birthday celebration. Sources claim taylor swift had her deliberately removed from the guest list due to their ongoing feud. While not directly involved, sources say travis kelce supported swift‚Äôs decision and was present at the party.

Article Title: Dylan Harper impresses in Summer League as San Antonio Spurs consider future without De'Aaron Fox
Article Text:
Dylan Harper is an impressive player (Image via Instagram / @dylharpp)

San Antonio Spurs face tough decisions as Dylan Harper shines alongside De'Aaron Fox

Dylan Harper in action (Image via Instagram / @dylharpp)

With the rookie class making their summer league debuts and teams anticipating the upcoming season, the 2025 NBA draft is now complete. According to an anonymous Western Conference scout, Dylan Harper may make De'Aaron Fox expendable to the San Antonio Spurs . He even received six votes when asked which rookie will end up being the best pick in the draft. Dylan Harper, the San Antonio Spurs' third consecutive top-five pick in the NBA Draft over the previous three years, was selected this year.ESPN recently surveyed early thoughts on the draft. Twenty unnamed NBA executives and scouts were polled by ESPN's Jeremy Woo to get their opinions on the incoming rookie class for the 2025‚Äì2026 NBA season. Participants voted on five questions based on their assessments and initial observations from this offseason.The questions included who organizations consider the front-runner for the No. 1 pick in 2026, which players were thought to be possible draft steals, and whether anyone may challenge Cooper Flagg for Rookie of the Year. The panelists shared their opinions.Six votes went to Dylan Harper of San Antonio Spurs, the No. 2 choice, who was considered as De'Aaron Fox expendable.Some people thought the team would be a good destination despite their packed backcourt.The S.A. Spurs, who have been preparing for more playmaking around Victor Wembanyama going ahead, selected Dylan Harper because of his skill at pick-and-roll and his cunning, potent style of play. He appears to be a key long-term player, even if he ends up starting as a rookie.As per ESPN, one Western Conference scout said:"[Harper] has some [Manu] Ginobili to his offensive game... If the 3-point shot ever becomes a true weapon [for him], he makes Fox expendable and gives San Antonio a nice trade asset."Many believe that the S.A. Spurs' path to being a competitive club has started with Dylan Harper's addition. In fact, one NBA legend advised Victor Wembanyama to change his style of play moving forward.The San Antonio Spurs now have three starting-level guards, none of whom would benefit from a spell off the bench, so they may need to deal with De'Aaron Fox's position. However, instead of taking any steps to cut De'Aaron Fox or other players, the team has signed Dylan Harper, who made an impression in Las Vegas.Also read: San Antonio Spurs share heartfelt message of support amid tragic Hill Country flooding
Article Summary: The 2025 nba draft is now complete. Dylan harper received six votes when asked which rookie will end up being the best pick in the draft. According to an anonymous western conference scout, dylan harper may make de'aaron fox expendable to the san antonio spurs.

Article Title: List of players revealed: YouTube stars join LIV Golf pros for exciting Duels event at UK's JCB Golf and Country Club
Article Text:
LIV Golf (Image Source: Getty)

The list of creators teaming up with pros for The Duels

Luke Kwon



Micah Morris



Seb Carmichael-Brown



Evan Thompson



Rick Shiels



Keeks Golf



Fore Bros.

JCB Golf and Country Club shines as host

LIV Golf's The Duels is now in the United Kingdom at JCB Golf and Country Club in Staffordshire. This fun event pairs professional golfers with popular YouTube creators for a quick nine-hole game, specifically designed for the YouTube audience. Fans are excited to see their favorite creators compete against pros, making this a significant event from July 25 to 27, 2025.The Duels: UK is the fourth event in LIV Golf's 2025 series, after stops in Miami, Virginia, and Dallas. The following seven creators are joining the event:Each creator pairs with a LIV Golf pro to form six teams for a fast nine-hole game.This setup is made to grab young fans on YouTube. These creators are renowned for their entertaining golf videos online, bringing fresh energy to the game. Fans can meet them at JCB Golf and Country Club on Friday, July 25, starting at 11:30 AM.The games will be filmed and shared on YouTube soon after, free for everyone to watch. This mix of golf and online stars makes The Duels special in the 2025 LIV Golf season, attracting fans who love both sports and digital entertainment.Also Read: LIV Golf's revenue soars IOX as league heads to UK's JCB Golf & Country Club, as per CEO Scott O'Neil The JCB Golf and Country Club in Staffordshire is the perfect spot for The Duels: UK. Known for its stunning design by Robin Hiseman, the course features a famous island green on the 17th hole.It‚Äôs a challenging yet beautiful setting for the creator-pro showdown.The venue also hosts a lively Fan Village, music, and fun activities, creating a festival vibe. Fans attending from July 25 to 27 can enjoy more than just golf, with chances to meet creators and pros.The course‚Äôs layout suits the fast-paced nine-hole scramble, making every shot exciting for viewers online. This event‚Äôs setting adds to its appeal, blending top golf with a fun atmosphere, ensuring fans have a great time both in person and watching on YouTube.
Article Summary: Liv golf's the duels is now in the united kingdom at jcb golf and country club in staffordshire. This fun event pairs professional golfers with popular youtube creators for a quick nine-hole game, specifically designed for the youtube audience. Fans attending from july 25 to 27 can enjoy more than just golf, with chances to meet creators and pros.

Article Title: Tyler Motte is still unsigned despite valuable depth and experience
Article Text:
Tyler Motte is still unsigned despite valuable depth and experience (Image Via Getty)

Tyler Motte offers a versatile bottom-six role, physics

Tyler Motte Highlights

Tyler Motte: The journey since leaving the Chicago Blackhawks

FAQs

Q1: Why hasn't Tyler Motte been able to sign with a new team yet?

Q2: What contract is Tyler Motte likely to receive?

Q3: Is it possible for Tyler Motte to continue impacting the NHL?

With the succession operating in full force during the offseason, some experienced players remain undrafted. Among them is former Chicago Blackhawks forward Tyler Motte, still looking for a new contract. While most teams were busy locking in their core targets earlier in July, Motte's free agency reflects on the quietness of his 2023-24 season and the ever-changing needs of franchises heading into this new campaign. Still, he can represent a potential value if picked up.A name associated with physical gameplay and penalty killing would be that of Tyler Motte, a player last seen suited up for the Detroit Red Wings. The 30-year-old had featured in 55 games for the 2023-24 season with an offensive output of 4 goals and 5 assists, alongside achieving a high number of hits (72). Regardless of that low-scoring rate, his excellence lies in being able to play either wing and contribute defensively while providing energy from the fourth line, which makes for great depth. Teams looking to fill their bottom-six rotation could very well value such a skill set on a short-term, inexpensive deal.Motte‚Äôs physical presence will be so important for a team seeking gritty, accountable players for the lineup.Not shy of taking hits, Motte is counted on in defensive zone draw situations and penalty killing to shut down threats. A rather down-to-earth contract expectation and a fair bunch of experience may see him slipping into a roster before pre-season training camp begins.Drafted by the Chicago Blackhawks at 121st overall in 2013, Tyler Motte made his NHL debut in the 2016-17 season, scoring four goals and seven points in 33 games. His Chicago stay, however, did not last long as he was shipped out in the 2017 summer deal that sent Artemi Panarin to Columbus. Afterward, Motte has played with multiple teams: the Vancouver Canucks, New York Rangers, and Ottawa Senators.While he's never quite been the star, consistency in fulfilling a very defined role has kept Motte afloat in the league. At the point of teams firming up their rosters, he remains a sure pick for deep line consideration.Also Read: Vladimir Orszagh to lead Slovakia at Milano-Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics Although the first wave of free-agent signings has passed, Tyler Motte remains relevant for one reason: his status as a hardworking forward who can fill multiple roles. His experience and willingness toAns: Less scoring last year may have reduced the urgency for Motte, but he remains a viable depth option.Ans: Probably a one-year, low-dollar contract with a team down on bottom-six depth and penalty kill.Ans: Of course, especially in a defensive, penalty-killing sort of role for a club seeking energy and grit.
Article Summary: Former chicago blackhawks forward tyler motte is still looking for a new contract. The 30-year-old had featured in 55 games for the 2023-24 season with an offensive output of 4 goals and 5 assists, alongside achieving a high number of hits (72) motte can play either wing and contribute defensively while providing energy from the fourth line.
